price: Ne wͻn a sε obi redi wͻn amim a (wͻngo wͻn ho mma saa nipa no, na mmom) wͻbͻ wͻn ho ban.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَابَهُمُ ٱلۡبَغۡيُ هُمۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna idhā aṣābahumu al-baghyu hum yantaṣirūna
